response.overview: Beverly is the perfect happy homemaker, along with her doting husband and two children, but this nuclear family just might explode when her fascination with serial killers collides with her ever-so-proper code of ethics.
response.tagline: Every mom wants to be wanted, but not for murder!
response.title: Serial Mom

titles.title: Serial Mom – Warum läßt Mama das Morden nicht?
